ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Ring Recommendation
ygData.msgSnippet: Velium Fire Opal is Enchanter made as well. ... From: Jeffrey Sue To: eqbards@egroups.com Sent: Monday, January 15, 2001 1:04 PM Subject: Re: [eqbards] Ring
ygData.messageBody:
Velium Fire Opal is Enchanter made as well.
----- Original Message -----
From: Jeffrey Sue
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2001 1:04 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Ring Recommendation


At 09:31 AM 1/15/01 -0600, you wrote:
>Somehow I lost one of my rings ┬¡ I forget the name it was a +7 Cha/+5 Dex
>(the other that I have is +5 Cha/ +7 Dex). I'm not sure if it was due to a
>bug ┬¡ or I left it on corpse the last time I looted it ┬¡ but regardless don'
>t see the point of trying to petition for a 200p item (that I doubt will get
>resolved positively anyway).
>
>Just curious what you all recommend for a 52 Bard.



platinum fire opal is what i wear. i've seen some people list velium fire opal
as well. are the velium ones enchanter made or do you find them off mobs?

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
